value.format: the directory storing xml and dsdl file
serName is user defined when configuring the server list
name of file to be saved
any container id -- container id can include wildcard
any container id -- container id can include wildcard
crs | any container id -- container id can include wildcard
-r[:n] --recursive to n levels down(-r:n) or the lowest(-r)
-c --display the container instances only not attribute
-a --display the attributes only but not the container instances
any container id -- container id can include wildcard
[path|container)] move to path or container, \nif no parameter, enter the container executing this edit command
